Kernel/sources/timers/clock.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #include <timers/clock.h>
00002 #include <panic/panic.h>
00003 #include <scheduler/process_scheduler.h>
00004 #include "pit.h"
00005 
00006 unsigned long clock_ticks;
00007 
00008 //When the PIT is triggered call a scheduler tick and add one to the clock ticks (Setup so different timers can be used for the scheduler/clock Etcetera)
00009 void pitCallback()
00010 {
00011         clock_ticks++;
00012 
00013         schedulerOnTick();
00014 }
00015 
00016 void initializeSystemClock()
00017 {
00018         clock_ticks = 0;
00019         setPitCallback(pitCallback);
00020         initializePit(1000);
00021 }
00022 
00023 unsigned long get_clock_ticks()
00024 {
00025         return clock_ticks;
00026 }
